animation.condition: [Window.IsActive(25) + [Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes)] + ![Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(tvshows)]] | [Container.Content(seasons) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Episode)] | [Container.Content(episodes) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Writer) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Plot)]

include.condition: Window.IsActive(500) | Window.IsActive(501) | Window.IsActive(502) | Container.Content(episodes) | Window.IsActive(25) | Window.IsActive(2)

control.visible: [Window.IsActive(25) + Container.Content(movies) + !Skin.HasSetting(movieslistfull)] | [Window.IsActive(25) + [Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes)] + !Container.Content(seasons)] | [Window.IsActive(25) + Container.Content(movies) + !Skin.HasSetting(movieslistfull)] | [[Window.IsActive(500) | Window.IsActive(501) | [Window.IsActive(502) + !Container.Content(artists) + !Container.Content(years)]] + ![[Container.Content(artists) + Skin.HasSetting(artistlistfull)] | [Container.Content(albums) + Skin.HasSetting(albumlistfull)] | [Container.Content(songs) + Skin.HasSetting(songlistfull)]]]

Window.IsActive(2) | [Window.IsActive(25) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(movieslistfull)] | [Window.IsActive(25) + [Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes)] + Container.Content(seasons)] | [[Window.IsActive(500) | Window.IsActive(501) | [Window.IsActive(502) + [!Container.Content(artists) + Skin.HasSetting(hidelistartisticons)] + !Container.Content(years) + !Container.Content(genres)]] + [[Container.Content(artists) + Skin.HasSetting(artistlistfull)] | [Container.Content(albums) + Skin.HasSetting(albumlistfull)] | [Container.Content(songs) + Skin.HasSetting(songlistfull)]]]

itemlayout.condition: [Window.IsActive(2) + !Skin.HasSetting(pictureslistfull)] | Window.IsActive(2) | [Window.IsActive(25) + !Skin.HasSetting(movieslistfull) + ![Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes)]] | [[Window.IsActive(500) | Window.IsActive(501) | Window.IsActive(502)] + ![[Container.Content(artists) + Skin.HasSetting(artistlistfull)] | [Container.Content(albums) + Skin.HasSetting(albumlistfull)] | [Container.Content(songs) + Skin.HasSetting(songlistfull)]]]

control.label: $INFO[ListItem.Label]
control.visible: ![Window.IsActive(500) | Window.IsActive(501) | Window.IsActive(502) | Container.Content(plugincontent)] | [[Window.IsActive(500) | Window.IsActive(501) | Window.IsActive(502)] + IsEmpty(ListItem.Artist)] | Container.Content(artists)

focusedlayout.condition: [Window.IsActive(2) + !Skin.HasSetting(pictureslistfull)] | [Window.IsActive(25) + !Skin.HasSetting(movieslistfull) + ![Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes)]] | [[Window.IsActive(500) | Window.IsActive(501) | Window.IsActive(502)] + ![[Container.Content(artists) + Skin.HasSetting(artistlistfull)] | [Container.Content(albums) + Skin.HasSetting(albumlistfull)] | [Container.Content(songs) + Skin.HasSetting(songlistfull)]]]

control.label: $INFO[ListItem.Label]
control.visible: ![Window.IsActive(500) | Window.IsActive(501) | Window.IsActive(502) | Container.Content(plugincontent)] | [[Window.IsActive(500) | Window.IsActive(501) | Window.IsActive(502)] + IsEmpty(ListItem.Artist)] | Container.Content(artists)

itemlayout.condition: [Window.IsActive(2) + Skin.HasSetting(pictureslistfull)] | [Window.IsActive(25) + Skin.HasSetting(movieslistfull) + ![Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes)]] | [[Window.IsActive(500) | Window.IsActive(501) | Window.IsActive(502)] + [[Container.Content(artists) + Skin.HasSetting(artistlistfull)] | [Container.Content(albums) + Skin.HasSetting(albumlistfull)] | [Container.Content(songs) + Skin.HasSetting(songlistfull)]]]

focusedlayout.condition: [Window.IsActive(2) + Skin.HasSetting(pictureslistfull)] | [Window.IsActive(25) + Skin.HasSetting(movieslistfull) + ![Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes)]] | [[Window.IsActive(502) | Window.IsActive(501)] + [[Container.Content(artists) + Skin.HasSetting(artistlistfull)] | [Container.Content(albums) + Skin.HasSetting(albumlistfull)] | [Container.Content(songs) + Skin.HasSetting(songlistfull)]]]
